attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in darlaston in the west midlands in secret there has been a bail hostel opened right next to a school to my horror there has even been paedophiles there I urge the prime minister to move the hostel to a more suitable location and demolish the building as it has been used for this kind of purpose before this way it will never happen again and our children will be in a safer environment
